properties.areaDesc: Northern Humboldt Coast; Coastal Del Norte
properties.headline: Frost Advisory issued March 1 at 2:42PM PST until March 2 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Eureka CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Temperatures as low as 34 will result in frost
formation.

* WHERE...Coastal Del Norte and Northern Humboldt Coast counties
including Fieldbrook, Blue Lake, Freshwater, Hydesville, and
Carlotta.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM PST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if
left uncovered.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Low temperatures are expected to be several
degrees warmer Monday night and Tuesday morning. As a result,
only patchy frost is expected in the coldest locations.
properties.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

NWSheadline: FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MONDAY
